name: Micrco Infinite Collectors - Two Player Split-Screen Game
name_original: Micrco Infinite Collectors - Two Player Split-Screen Game
description:
Each version of the game works with the same profile. ( Versions only change backgrounds. )

The game is being saved each time you exit it and loads the last save each time you run it.

CONTROLS :

Player 1 : w,a,s,d, and z,g,h,j

Player 2 : arrow keys and num5,num1,num2,num3
